projects.name: Youtube Ref
projects.description: Saves points in videos to watch later
projects.details: A MERN stack app for managing reference points on Youtube videos
projects.image-description: screenshot of a main home window

projects.name: GPA-Tracker
projects.description: Keeps track of GPA throughout a student's program
projects.details: A React app that makes it easier to viualize a student's program map as well as track grades
projects.image-description: screenshot of a the main applications window

projects.name: Timetable Transfer
projects.description: Transfers school timetable to Google Calender
projects.details: A desktop app with a simple GUI inteface to read timetable content from a website and convert it into a csv to be imported into Google Calender.
projects.language: C#, WPF, Google Calendar, Web Scraping

projects.name: Poker C++ With GUI
projects.details: An extention of the original one made with the GUI Library SGL
projects.image-description: screenshot of a simpliflied poker game with cards

projects.name: SimplyCalc
projects.details: A calculator made using Android Studio that allows for basic functions.

projects.name: Re:2048
projects.details: A version of the popular mobile tile-based game that was released in 2015. I created it using JavaFX GUI library and Java. I also made a few modifications to it such as automatic resizing of the tiles, and custom tiles.

projects.name: Poker C
projects.details: A version of the popular card game poker made with c++. It can keep track of user scores.
